attachments.fallback:
[April 12th, 2020 5:30 PM] nichole.starr: Hi team, thanks for starting this group and all the work you are doing.
I'm a surgical resident from the US (UCSF), was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Dessie, Ethiopia many years ago and have been living in Addis the past two years working with Lifebox on improving surgical safety.
Regarding COVID-19, I'm working with Lifebox, and multiple partners from sub-Saharan Africa on preparing surgical systems for safe response to COVID - our recent publication and COVID-19 resources are here: <https://www.lifebox.org/covid-19-resources/>
We are also working with a lab at Stanford and the N95 decon team (<http://N95decon.org|N95decon.org>) to test multiple materials and reprocessing methods for masks and respirators, even gloves, to make sure they are effective and safe. If anyone has samples they would like tested, or reprocessing methods to suggest and test, please reach out, we can coordinate efforts.
attachments.text:
Hi team, thanks for starting this group and all the work you are doing.
I'm a surgical resident from the US (UCSF), was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Dessie, Ethiopia many years ago and have been living in Addis the past two years working with Lifebox on improving surgical safety.
Regarding COVID-19, I'm working with Lifebox, and multiple partners from sub-Saharan Africa on preparing surgical systems for safe response to COVID - our recent publication and COVID-19 resources are here: <https://www.lifebox.org/covid-19-resources/>
We are also working with a lab at Stanford and the N95 decon team (<http://N95decon.org|N95decon.org>) to test multiple materials and reprocessing methods for masks and respirators, even gloves, to make sure they are effective and safe. If anyone has samples they would like tested, or reprocessing methods to suggest and test, please reach out, we can coordinate efforts.
